Stitches
If you have had stitches, bathe 
the area often in clean warm 
water to help it to heal. Have a 
bath or shower with plain warm 
water. Afterwards, dry yourself 
carefully.	In	the	first	few	days,	
remember  to sit down gently 
and lie on your side rather 
than	on	your	back.	Pelvic	floor	
exercises can also help you to 
heal (see page 45).
